alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:16AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Haskell and Throckmorton Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 516 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weinert, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Throckmorton, Rochester, Weinert, O`Brien, Irby, Millers Creek Reservoir, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283, Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
